name: UmbralShadowRestraint2
descrip: ¡Atrapan a tu enemigo con restricciones mágicas!Requiere que tu boca sea libre.
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] cantan y hace algunos movimientos arcanos antes de enviar cuerdas mágicas, vinculante [TargetYouOrMonsterName]!
statusMiss: [AttackerName] chants and makes a few arcane motions before sending out magical ropes, but [TargetName] easily evades them!
restraintStruggle: [TargetName] struggles against [AttackerName]'s tight, intertwining magical chains binding [TargetHisOrHer] body, making them clank and strain...
restraintStruggleCharmed: [TargetName] weakly struggles against [AttackerName]'s tight, intertwining magical chains binding [TargetHisOrHer] body, making them clank and strain...
restraintEscapedFail: But [TargetName] can't get free of [AttackerName]'s oppressive leash!
